Do you need a complete guest management solution for your social events?
Watch video
Coming soon on

Are you a host? We've got you covered.


1. Create your event

Tell MyRsvp what event you want, choose what you need to manage and fill in all the details including custom services.

Few clicks and you're ready to go.


2. Craft your invitation card

When your invitees will receive the invitation link they'll end up on your event landing page.

This page has your invitation card, the RSVP module and all the info about your event. Be creative!

See a preview

3. Fill your invitees list

Add people to your invitees list in any way you prefer, categorise them, and choose how to send out the invite.

You might be working with very long lists so we'll keep track of where you stopped at last time.


4. Send out the invites

So you built your invitees list, now it is time to send out the invites.

You can choose to do it manually or let the app blast them out automatically.


5. Manage your guest list

Watch your guest list grow as you start receiving all the RSVPs.

Search for guests, filter them, add attending guest manually without sending out the invitation, and export the whole list to pdf.


6. Control the situation

Get all the info you need at a glance on the overview page.

From here you can also access all your management tools including tables, registration, and angpows.

MyRsvp is packed with features to make you run your events smoothly, from invitation to registration.

Synced registration
Enjoy fast and smooth registration synced among all co-host.

A guest brought extra people? No problem: add them during registration and any co-hosts will see them on the table view and easily rearrange seats.

You'll also see the % of arrived guests.
Table management
Manage hundreds of tables with a finger. You can sort out your guests with smart filtering, move guests across tables and see the live status of tables on event day while registration progresses.

You can also export it to pdf.
Custom RSVP questions
Are you providing additional services to your guests like baby chairs or halal menu?

Great! your invitees will be able to indicate how many people need these services when they RSVP from your event landing page.
Invitation card editor
Our selection of card templates is not enough for you?

Upload your own design or get full creative control with a powerful card editor.
Export everything to pdf
Export your guest list, seating arrangements and past event reports to extremely detailed pdf files.

That way you can print them out or share them with anyone.
Angpow book
Do you need to keep track of all those angpows?

Divide all the envelops among your co-hosts so everyone can quickly record guests' angpows amounts on a shared list!
Smart filters
You will be dealing with long lists of names so it is important that you find who you're looking for quickly.

Filter by alphabet, attendance status, RSVP references, and relationship.

Are you looking for attending vegetarian friends? Filter, done.
Extreme flexibility
Whatever you need, we give you options.

From accommodating different event typologies to handling last minute changes...

...and we have so much more in the works!

What about your guests? Same app!


Keep track of all your events

Busy being a guest? Keep track of all the events you've been invited to.

If you already RSVP to an event before installing the app you can always add it to your list using the event code later on.


RSVP and event info

Access all the event info and RSVP to the invitation at any time.

If the host updates something you'll be notified of the changes.


Self-Registration!

If the host allowed self-registration guests can skip completely the queue and just tap "I'm here" when they reach the venue.

On events with arranged tables guests will also see their table number after registering.
